Package org.apache.accumulo.core.client.lexicoder

Interface Encoder<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Lexicoder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEncoder, org.apache.accumulo.core.clientImpl.lexicoder.AbstractLexicoder, BigIntegerLexicoder, BytesLexicoder, DateLexicoder, DoubleLexicoder, FloatLexicoder, IntegerLexicoder, ListLexicoder, LongLexicoder, PairLexicoder, ReverseLexicoder, SequenceLexicoder, StringLexicoder, TextLexicoder, UIntegerLexicoder, ULongLexicoder, UUIDLexicoder
    public interface Encoder<T>
    An encoder represents a typed object that can be encoded/decoded to/from a byte array.
    Since:
    1.6.0
